section.title: HW: Mind-Boggling Math Facts
section.p: From the dawn of human history, people have turned to mathematics for answers to a variety complicated problems. Mathematics has been to found to provide the logic and sound consistency needed to approach the world empirically. Studying mathematics have brought significant advances in everything from Chemistry to Psychology to Economics to Engineering.

But sometimes math has pointed us in surprising directions. Sometimes, we find things that hard to believe. Live Science's article "5 Mind-Boggling Math Facts" (livescience.com) gives us a few examples of the weirdness of math.

statement.p: Read the article from Live Science entitled "5 Mind-Boggling Math Facts".
